title: Aren't Normal Games Supposed to be Fun?
body: Kinda hard to have a fun game when you constantly get dived by the premade enemy team.  Last game I was Jinx and against a Zilean and Vayne.  I was doing pretty well until out of nowhere Master Yi, who was premade with Zilean, appears.  I thought at first, "wow that was a nice gank, he caught me off guard there".  But then he came again.  And again.  And again.  And when he hit 6, the TF, who was also in their group, started to use every single ult bot lane.  Even when we were under our own tower, Morg would land a good bind, we would poke at them, then suddenly Yi and TF are there, and we get 4 man dived.  This happened about 4 times.  I really hate when premades suck the fun right out of the game. :^)  (also their bot wasn't very good, and it's annoying that they got a free win because premade OP)

replies.body: Hmm, customs arent meant to be fun, a LOT of people use normal to practice for ranked, so you're gonna have those games where either premades, or someone just practicing trounces you, it happens.

You kept dying to the enemies.  You can't really expect them to give up free gold and map pressure.

I'm not saying it's your fault; I'm simply saying it wasn't unreasonable for them to keep coming back.
I didn't.  The first gank was successful, the next 3 weren't.  They only camped me because Zilean was premade with them.

Odd, I find it hilarious/fun when I get dove, and get out scot free.

If you didn't die, then that's overall good for your team, as they could then apply pressure to other areas of the map.
Well it was generally alright until TF came into the equation.  Then he got so fed that we couldn't stop him.

> [{quoted}](name=Limrick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RhcxoJRg,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-27T01:52:54.749+0000)

Even when we were under our own tower, Morg would land a good bind, we would poke at them, then suddenly Yi and TF are there, and we get 4 man dived.  This happened about 4 times.  I really hate when premades suck the fun right out of the game. :^)  (also their bot wasn&#039;t very good, and it&#039;s annoying that they got a free win because premade OP)

If you aren't having fun, go play Maplestory.
the game it self is meant for fun....
